title: [OFFICIAL QUT] OCEANIC UNIVERSITY CHAMPIONSHIPS
body:
Hi guys! There's quite a lot interest around the Oceanic University Championship and I know that there's some of you who'd like to participate but don't have a team. No worries, we've got you covered, just follow the steps below!

Anyone can enter as long as ALL PLAYERS ARE QUT STUDENTS (with proof of ID checks). 

1) Fill in the Google Form (below)
2) After you've completed the form, we'll put your details into a spreadsheet and try to sort players into teams with similar skill level and role synergy. Once a team is complete, we'll put you guys into a chat group to get acquainted! Please join the QUT League of Legends Facebook group so that I can add you. 
3) Last step, don't forget to officially register your team (signups close July 28th, 18:00pm AEST). You and the team will have to do that yourself.

Link to Oceanic University Championship: http://oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/page/ouc-team-registration

Any questions, ask them below!

http://goo.gl/forms/VdzKzwKdo9

replies.body:
Sorry for the late reply! It seems that the form isn't working on the post. Click on the link below! It should be rather straight forward. 

http://goo.gl/forms/0vDrIXa4KC
idk how to fill in the spread sheet for solo entry
